notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: Our data has been deposited with the Harvard University Dataverse, where it will be available for use without restriction. The dataset can be accessed at: http://dx.doi.org/10.7910/DVN/IF8AO0. Its full citation is: "Mildenberger, Matto, 2016, "The distribution of climate change public opinion in Canada", http://dx.doi.org/10.7910/DVN/IF8AO0, Harvard Dataverse, V1 [UNF:6:h06KqVJk4k6OOrqr6GnSdA==]." Our data will also be available for public download on institutional servers at Universite de Montreal ( http://umontreal.ca/climat/) and Yale University ( http://environment.yale.edu/ycom/canada/2016/).
